mapper.insert: insert into news ( title, creationTime, coverUrl, amount) values ( #{title}, #{creationTime}, #{coverUrl}, #{amount})
INSERT INTO like_user_news ( user_id, news_id, create_time ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{newsId}, now() )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM like_user_news WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND news_id = #{newsId}
DELETE FROM favorite_user_news WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND news_id = #{newsId}
mapper.update: update news set amount=amount+1 where id =#{id}
mapper.select: select n.id, n.title, n.creationTime, n.coverUrl, n.amount,c.content c_content from news n JOIN newscontent c ON n.id = c.id where n.id = #{id}
